doc:
Helen McCrory https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_McCrory 0 Helen Elizabeth McCrory (born 17 August 1968) is a British actress. McCrory portrayed Cherie Blair in both The Queen (2006) and The Special Relationship (2010). She also portrayed Francoise in the film Charlotte Gray (2001), Narcissa Malfoy in the final three Harry Potter films, Mama Jeanne in Martin Scorsese's family film Hugo (2011), Clair Dowar in the James Bond film Skyfall (2012), Polly Gray in Peaky Blinders (2013–present), and Emma Banville in Fearless (2017). She now lives in Suffolk. Helen_Elizabeth_McCrory ( born 17_August_1968 ) is a_British_actress . McCrory portrayed Cherie_Blair in both The_Queen_(_2006_) and The_Special_Relationship_(_2010_) . She also portrayed Francoise in the_film_Charlotte_Gray_(_2001_) , Narcissa_Malfoy in the_final_three_Harry_Potter_films , Mama_Jeanne in Martin_Scorsese 's_family_film_Hugo_(_2011_) , Clair_Dowar in the_James_Bond_film_Skyfall_(_2012_) , Polly_Gray in Peaky_Blinders_(_2013 – present_) , and Emma_Banville in Fearless_(_2017_) . She now lives in Suffolk .
